short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR Code of current page URL which helps to open an URL through the mobile or similar platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Useful tool to generate QR code and scan it using your Mobile, Tablet, etc. This extension is only using the "tabs" permission only when you click on the button. You can generate the QR Code instantly by clicking on the button. This is very useful to share the URL from laptop/desktop to Mobile devices. Just scan it and get the URL. 
Enjoy!!
